id: December 2nd, 11am - 12pm ET | Workshop: Let's Plan 2024 with Notion!
name: December 2nd, 11am - 12pm ET | Workshop: Let's Plan 2024 with Notion!
description: Join us!Join us for a workshop about how to Plan 2024 with Notion! As the year is coming to a close, let's go ahead and prepare to plan for our 2024! We'll discuss about making resolutions and concepts relating to making new years plans. Then, we'll dive into creating a Notion set-up for planning 2024 so you can build together.
